ids_info.name: edge_transport
ids_info.description: Edge plasma transport. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)

edge_transport/midplane.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: edge_transport/midplane
IDS: edge_transport
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: edge_transport
FIELD_NAME: midplane
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: edge_transport -> midplane

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Choice of midplane definition (use the lowest index number if more than one value is relevant) 

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[edge_transport]: Edge plasma transport. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)

edge_transport/model/flux_multiplier.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: edge_transport/model/flux_multiplier
IDS: edge_transport
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: edge_transport/model
FIELD_NAME: flux_multiplier
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: edge_transport -> model -> flux_multiplier

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Multiplier applied to the particule flux when adding its contribution in the expression of the heat flux : can be 0, 3/2 or 5/2

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[edge_transport]: Edge plasma transport. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)
CONTAINER[edge_transport/model]: Transport is described by a combination of various transport models
